##### Exercise 3  

```{r}
xy <- runif(2) 
print(xy) #cartesian coordinates

r <- sqrt((xy[1]^2)+(xy[2]^2))
th <- atan((xy[2])/(xy[1]))
c(r,th) #polar coordinates
```

##### Exercise 4  

```{r}
queue <- c("sheep", "fox", "owl", "ant")
print(queue)

a <- c(queue, "serpent") 
print(a)  # part a

b <- a[-1]
# a[!a %in% "sheep"] also works but not as simple
print(b)  # part b

c <- c("donkey", b)
print(c)  # part c

d <- c[-5]
print(d)  # part d

e <- d[-3]
print(e)  # part e

f <- append(e, "aphid", after = 2)
print(f) # part f

g <- which(f == "aphid")
print(g)  # part g

```
